name: KRKNN
summary: k-Nearest Neighbor that classficiation method on Machine Learning.
description: Machine Learning (マシンラーニング) in this project, it implemented KNN(k-Nearest Neighbor) that classification method. It can be used on products recommendation (おすすめの商品), user behavior analysis (ユーザーの行動分析), data mining (データマイニング) and data analysis (データ分析).
